lyrics.content: some boys are tryin' too hard He don't try at all, though
Touch me and you'll never be alone
In the middle of the night, in my dreams, You should see the things we do, baby
I wanna be your endgame, I wanna be your first string ,I wanna be your A-Team ,I wanna be your endgame
I got a bad boy persona, that's what they like, You love it, I love it too 'cause you my type, You hold me down and I protect you with my life
If a man talks shit, then I owe him nothing,I don't regret it one bit, 'cause he had it coming
They're burning all the witches, even if you aren't one,So light me up
I once was poison ivy, but now I'm your daisy
My name is whatever you decide, And I'm just gonna call you mine
Is it chill that you're in my head?, 'Cause I know that it's delicate
Sometimes I wonder, when you sleep, Are you ever dreaming of me?, Sometimes when I look into your eyes, I pretend you're mine all the damn time

songs.name: Look what You Made Me Do

lyrics.content: I don't trust nobody and nobody trusts me, I'll be the actress starring in your bad dreams
I'm yours to keep, And I'm yours to lose
See you in the dark, All eyes on you, my magician
You know I'm not a bad girl, But I do bad things with you
I make all your gray days clear and, Wear you like a necklace, I'm so chill, but you make me jealous,But I got your heart, Skippin', skip-skippin' when I'm gone
Whisky on ice, Sunset and Vine, You've ruined my life, by not being mine
You're so gorgeous, I can't say anything to your face
I wanna be your endgame, I wanna be your first string ,I wanna be your A-Team ,I wanna be your endgame1
I got a bad boy persona, that's what they like, You love it, I love it too 'cause you my type, You hold me down and I protect you with my life
The ties were black, the lies were white, In shades of gray in candlelight, I wanted to leave him, I needed a reason
I'm perfectly fine, I live on my own, I made up my mind, I'm better off being alone
'Cause all the boys in their expensive cars, With their Range Rovers and their Jaguars,Never took me quite where you do
Your love is a secret, I'm hoping, dreaming, dying to keep
The taste of your lips is my idea of luxury
Deep blue, but you painted me golden
People started talking, putting us through our paces, I knew there was no one in the world who could take it, I had a bad feeling
I loved you in spite of, Deep fears that the world would divide us
I'm a mess, but I'm the mess that you wanted
Our secret moments in your crowded room, They got no idea about me and you
Say my name and everything just stops, I don't want you like a best friend
Even in my worst times,You could see the best of me, Flashback to my mistakes, My rebounds, my earthquakes, Even in my worst lies, You saw the truth in me
There is an indentation in the shape of you, Made your mark on me, a golden tattoo
Deep blue, but you painted me golden
People started talking, putting us through our paces, I knew there was no one in the world who could take it, I had a bad feeling
I loved you in spite of, Deep fears that the world would divide us
I'm a mess, but I'm the mess that you wanted

songs.name: This Is Why We Can't Have Nice Thing

lyrics.content: So why'd you have to rain on my parade?, I'm shaking my head, I'm locking the gates
There I was giving you a second chance, But you stabbed me in the back while shaking my hand, And therein lies the issue, friends don't try to trick you
But I'm not the only friend you've lost lately, If only you weren't so shady
Here's a toast to my real friends, They don't care about the he said, she said

My castle crumbled overnight, I brought a knife to a gunfight, They took the crown, but it's alright, All the liars are calling me one, Nobody's heard from me for months, I'm doing better than I ever was
I want to wear his initial, On a chain 'round my neck, chain 'round my neck, Not because he owns me, But 'cause he really knows me
Please don't ever become a stranger, Whose laugh I could recognize anywhere
Hold on to the memories, they will hold on to you
You squeeze my hand three times in the back of the taxi, I can tell that it's gonna be a long road
Baby, baby, I feel crazy, Up all night, all night and every day, Give me somethin', oh, but you say nothin',What is happening to me?
I'm sittin' eyes wide open, And I got one thing stuck in my mind, Wonderin' if I dodged a bullet, Or just lost the love of my life, oh
You put your eyes on me, In this moment now capture it, remember it
And I don't know how it gets better than this, You take my hand and drag me head first, Fearless
It's the first kiss, it's flawless, really something, it's fearless, Oh, yeah
It's your freshman year, And you're gonna be here for the next four years, In this town
We were both young when I first saw you, I close my eyes and the flashback starts, I'm standin' there
Come feel this magic I've been feeling since I met you, Can't help it if there's no one else
The way you walk, way you talk, way you say my name, It's beautiful, wonderful, don't you ever change
Hey Stephen, why are people always leaving?, I think you and I should stay the same
Hey Stephen, I could give you 50 reasons, Why I should be the one you choose
Maybe I was naive, got lost in your eyes, And never really had a chance, My mistake, I didn't know to be in love
If you could see that I'm the one, Who understands you, Been here all along, So, why can't you see?, You belong with me
And you've got a smile, That can light up this whole town
It's two am, Feelin' like I just lost a friend, Hope you know this ain't easy, Easy for me
I'm sick and tired of your attitude, I'm feeling like I don't know you, You tell me that you love me, then you cut me down, And I need you like a heartbeat
Why do you have to make me feel small, So you can feel whole inside?, Why do you have to put down my dreams, So you're the only thing on my mind?
All this time I was wasting, Hoping you would come around, I've been giving out chances every time, And all you do is let me down, And it's taking me this long
Why do you have to make me feel small, So you can feel whole inside?, Why do you have to put down my dreams, So you're the only thing on my mind?

songs.name: The way I loved you (Taylor's Version)

lyrics.content: But I miss screaming and fighting and kissing in the rain, And it's 2 a.m. and I'm cursing your name, So in love that you act insane, And that's the way I loved you
It's a roller coaster kind of rush, And I never knew I could feel that much, And that's the way I loved you
you looked me in the eye and told me you loved me
Was I out of line?, Did I say something way too honest, made you run and hide, Like a scared little boy
I didn't know if you knew, So I'm taking this chance to say, That I had the best day with you today
And it's a sad picture, the final blow hits you, Somebody else gets what you wanted again and,You know it's all the same, another time and place
I like the way you sound in the morning, We're on the phone and without a warning, I realize your laugh is the best sound, I have ever heard
Every time you smile, I smile, And every time you shine, I'll shine for you

I'm feeling you, baby,  Don't be afraid to jump then fall, Jump then fall into me,  Baby, I'm never gonna leave you, Say that you wanna be with me too, 'Cause I'ma stay through it all, So jump then fall
And when you're close, I feel like comin' undone
In the middle of the night, when I'm in this dream, It's like a million little stars spellin' out your name, You gotta come on, come on, say that we'll be together

songs.name: Come In With The Rain (Taylor's Version)

lyrics.content: I've watched you so long, screamed your name, I don't know what else I can say
This is wrong, but I can't help but feel like, There ain't nothing more right, babe

songs.name: The Other Side of The door (Taylor's Version)

lyrics.content: I said, 'Leave', but all I really want is you
Time slows down, Whenever you're around, I can feel my heart, It's beating in my chest, Did you feel it?, I can't put this down
You told me I was pretty when I looked like a mess, Today was a fairytale
The best and worst day of June, Was the one that I met you
Hello Mr. 'Perfectly fine', How's your heart after breaking mine?
Hello Mr. 'Casually cruel', Mr. 'Everything revolves around you', I've been Miss 'Misery' since your goodbye, And you're Mr.
Well, I thought you might be different than the rest, I guess you're all the same
I hate those voices, Tellin' me I'm not in love anymore
I said, 'I know', When you said, 'I did you wrong, made mistakes, And put you through all of this''
Sometimes I really wish that I could hate you, I've tried, but that's just somethin' I can't do, My heart knows what the truth is, I swore I wouldn't do this
Bye, bye, to everything I thought was on my side,  Bye, bye, baby, I want you bad but it's come down to nothing, And all I have is your sympathy
